00031 #ifdef COMPILE_CRYPT_SUPPORT
00032 
00033         #include "KviCryptEngine.h"
00034         #include "Rijndael.h"
00035 
00036         class KviRijndaelEngine : public KviCryptEngine
00037         {
00038                 Q_OBJECT
00039         public:
00040                 KviRijndaelEngine();
00041                 virtual ~KviRijndaelEngine();
00042         private:
00043                 Rijndael * m_pEncryptCipher;
00044                 Rijndael * m_pDecryptCipher;
00045         public:
00046                 virtual bool init(const char *encKey,int encKeyLen,const char *decKey,int decKeyLen);
00047                 virtual KviCryptEngine::EncryptResult encrypt(const char * plainText,KviCString &outBuffer);
00048                 virtual KviCryptEngine::DecryptResult decrypt(const char * inBuffer,KviCString &plainText);
00049         protected:
00050                 virtual bool binaryToAscii(const char *,int,KviCString &){ return false; };
00051                 virtual bool asciiToBinary(const char *,int *,char **){ return false; };
00052                 virtual int getKeyLen(){ return 32; };
00053                 virtual Rijndael::KeyLength getKeyLenId(){ return Rijndael::Key32Bytes; };
00054         private:
00055                 void setLastErrorFromRijndaelErrorCode(int errCode);
00056         };
00057

00148         class KviMircryptionEngine : public KviCryptEngine
00149         {
00150                 Q_OBJECT
00151         public:
00152                 KviMircryptionEngine();
00153                 ~KviMircryptionEngine();
00154         protected:
00155                 KviCString m_szEncryptKey;
00156                 bool m_bEncryptCBC;
00157                 KviCString m_szDecryptKey;
00158                 bool m_bDecryptCBC;
00159         public:
00160                 virtual bool isCryptographicEngine(){ return false; }; // we need to return false since it doesn't use the Qt::CTRL+P escape
00161                 virtual bool init(const char *encKey,int encKeyLen,const char *decKey,int decKeyLen);
00162                 virtual KviCryptEngine::EncryptResult encrypt(const char * plainText,KviCString &outBuffer);
00163                 virtual KviCryptEngine::DecryptResult decrypt(const char * inBuffer,KviCString &plainText);
00164         protected:
00165                 bool doDecryptECB(KviCString &encoded,KviCString &plain);
00166                 bool doDecryptCBC(KviCString &encoded,KviCString &plain);
00167                 bool doEncryptECB(KviCString &plain,KviCString &encoded);
00168                 bool doEncryptCBC(KviCString &plain,KviCString &encoded);
00169         };
